document_data.caption: A quern station
document_data.name: Quern
document_data.mainbody: '''Querns''' were scientific items in the Realms often used by [[wizard]]s to grind substances into fine powder at a much faster rate than if they used a [[mortar and pestle]].
document_data.Description: A quern resembled a much smaller version of a miller's wheel that could be operated by hand via a small handle located at the top.
document_data.History: These items were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 20 [[gold piece]]s.
